[ar:Rod Wave]
[al:Pray 4 Love]

[00:00.00]Rags2Riches(feat. ATR Son Son) - Rod Wave
[00:13.02]Lyrics by：Rodarius Green/Adam Janeček/Adarsh Mani
[00:26.04]Ayy Zypitano got that gas
[00:28.22]Got that gas
[00:29.11]Got that gas
[00:30.15]Six chill fool for real for real
[00:33.21]Six chill
[00:34.16]Six chill
[00:44.78]Yeah
[00:46.49]Look
[00:47.45]Uh look
[00:48.66]We went from rags to riches uh
[00:50.43]Project fences to livin' luxury
[00:53.10]Now we live luxury
[00:54.46]Straight out that bottom nobody gave nothing to me
[00:57.04]Be careful while f**king with me
[00:58.67]All of my lil' brothers 'bout it they cuttin' for me
[01:01.15]Yeah they gon' cut you for me
[01:02.73]Lay in the cut with them cutters and cut you for free
[01:05.27]Say she in love with me what else
[01:06.92]But save your love I just want your company
[01:09.06]I fall in the club for free
[01:10.88]I give out daps and them hugs wasn't no one's for me
[01:13.22]'Cause that type of s**t don't faze a player uh
[01:17.00]What else
[01:17.53]This type of s**t is what make a hater
[01:21.04]When you got it out the mud yeah
[01:23.92]Ran it up yeah
[01:25.69]Really don't give no f**k yeah
[01:27.97]Don't give no f**k
[01:29.25]When you turn nothing to something yeah
[01:31.97]Really hustlin' yeah
[01:33.79]Young and gettin that money yeah
[01:36.04]We getting that money yeah
[01:37.83]Rags to riches what else
[01:39.42]Rags to riches uh what else
[01:40.83]Rags to riches what else
[01:42.06]Rags to riches what else
[01:43.21]Rags to riches uh what else
[01:44.95]Rags to riches what else d**n
[01:46.22]Rags to riches what else
[01:47.62]Rags to riches uh what else
[01:49.03]Rags to riches what else
[01:51.25]To riches what else d**n
[01:55.41]Yeah
[01:57.40]Yeah yeah
[02:01.23]Rags to riches rags to
[02:03.95]Ayy Zay B Tano got that gas
[02:05.63]Rags to riches rags to riches
[02:08.19]6 chill fool for real for real
[02:09.57]Rags to riches
[02:13.52]Oh no oh no said
[02:17.50]Oh no oh no said
[02:21.91]Yeah

[ar:Rod Wave]
[al:Pray 4 Love]

[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:13.02]//
[00:26.04]Zypitano制作
[00:28.22]名声大噪
[00:29.11]名声大噪
[00:30.15]Daysix制作
[00:33.21]纵享欢乐
[00:34.16]纵享欢乐
[00:44.78]//
[00:46.49]听着
[00:47.45]听着
[00:48.66]我们白手起家
[00:50.43]四处碰壁到过上奢靡的生活
[00:53.10]如今我们过着奢靡的生活
[00:54.46]我靠自己摸爬滚打 没有人帮助过我
[00:57.04]当你跟我混时 你得小心谨慎
[00:58.67]我的所有兄弟愿意为我赴汤蹈火
[01:01.15]他们会帮我干掉你
[01:02.73]他们全副武装 随时可以干掉你
[01:05.27]她说她爱上了我 还有什么话要说
[01:06.92]你还是别在我身上浪费时间 我只是希望你陪着我
[01:09.06]我在夜店里尽情放纵
[01:10.88]我主动问好 拥抱他们 可是没有人理睬我
[01:13.22]这些事情不会有才能的人感到心烦意乱
[01:17.00]还有什么
[01:17.53]胡说八道只会招来嫉妒
[01:21.04]当你出人头地 功成名就
[01:23.92]努力奋斗
[01:25.69]我真的不屑一顾
[01:27.97]置之不理
[01:29.25]当你从无名小卒变成大人物的时候
[01:31.97]埋头苦干
[01:33.79]年轻有为 拼命赚钱
[01:36.04]我们赚到盆满钵满
[01:37.83]从一贫如洗到家财万贯 还能有谁
